Description:
Indicates sign-ins from an anonymous IP address, for example, using an anonymous browser or VPN.

Author: Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Anonymous IP Address
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'anonymizedipaddress'
